pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.4: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.5: 90. The training rule on having a nun massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.2: the nuns were having a nun massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.3: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.4: “How can nuns get a nun to massage and rub them? They’re just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.7: “How can nuns get a nun to massage and rub them?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.13: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.14.1: ‘If a nun has a nun massage her or rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.7: If she has a nun massage her:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.8: if she gets her to massage her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.9: Or if she has a nun rub her:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.10: if she gets her to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.6: The seventh training rule is finished.
